name: Bear Space Force (aka Global Warming Simulator)
name_original: Bear Space Force (aka Global Warming Simulator)
description:
Bear Space Force (aka Global Warming Simulator) is a game developed by andrewsirkoch and mishapozd. It came out on 04-04-2022.
Bear Space Force (aka Global Warming Simulator) is available on Web and PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
